Human Activities.description: Activities performed by humans that impact the environment

Greenhouse Gas Emissions.description: Release of gases like CO2 and methane into the atmosphere

Deforestation.description: Clearing of forests for various purposes

Pollution.description: Introduction of harmful substances into the environment

Ocean Acidification.description: Decrease in ocean pH due to increased CO2 absorption

Increased CO2 levels.description: Elevated levels of carbon dioxide in the atmosphere

Water Contamination.description: Contamination of water sources with pollutants

Air Pollution.description: Presence of harmful substances in the air

Melting Glaciers.description: Melting of glaciers and ice caps

Sea Level Rise.description: Increase in sea level due to thermal expansion and melting ice

Coral Bleaching.description: Loss of color in corals due to stress

Marine Ecosystem Disruption.description: Disruption of marine ecosystems due to ocean acidification

Biodiversity Loss.description: Loss of plant and animal species

Climate Change.description: Long-term changes in temperature and weather patterns

Respiratory Problems.description: Respiratory illnesses caused by air pollution

Coastal Flooding.description: Flooding of coastal areas due to sea level rise

Coral Reef Degradation.description: Damage and destruction of coral reefs

Ecosystem Instability.description: Instability and reduced resilience of ecosystems

Extreme Weather Events.description: More frequent and intense weather events
